evidence.claim: BNB Healthcare leverages AWS Lambda for serverless computing.
The company implements FHIR standards for health data exchange.
BNB Healthcare is compliant with HIPAA regulations regarding patient data handling.
Uses Amazon S3 for scalable data storage in healthcare applications.
Employs API Gateway for managing their APIs effectively.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of specific X12 usage or clearinghouse related activities found.
